mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, u.user_nickname AS writer, r.content, r.star, r.created_at, r.user_id, r.program_id FROM review r, users u WHERE r.program_id = #{programId} AND u.user_id = r.user_id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
SELECT r.review_id, u.user_nickname AS writer, r.content, r.star, r.created_at, r.user_id, r.program_id FROM review r, users u WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND u.user_id = r.user_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( content, star, program_id, user_id) VALUES( #{content}, #{star}, #{programId}, #{userId});
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, star = #{star}, created_at = now() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
